code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddBook=_ref=>{let{onAdd}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[author,setAuthor]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onAdd({id:Date.now().toString(),title,author});setTitle('');setAuthor('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Author",value:author,onChange:e=>setAuthor(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Book"})]});};export default AddBook;
